International Dresden Dialogue

  • www.dresden.de/dresden-dialogue

    Social Cohesion and the City, from 2 to 3 of October 2017 in Dresden

    The International Dresden Dialogue wants to discuss the question of community cohesion in cities, focusing in particular on the role of social media in fostering or challenging this cohesion as well as the role of art and culture.
